summary: This mod simply adds green Grass to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/638/nexustemplate2.jpg/][IMG]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/8449/nexustemplate2.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]


Hey Guys,

this is a very simple mod for Whiterun. This Mod alters the grass from brown (or something) to green. Not really immersive (in sense of Bethesdas Vanilla Whiterun - yep, youre right, how can grass not be Immersive :) ), but i like it. Maybe you might want to use it too, or combine it with other mods, like \"Sexy Whiterun\" :) 

Now the Mod comes with four different colors (see screenshots) and you can also use it with Chris2012s Whiterun HQ Texture Pack. If you´re using an unmodded (or other mod then Chris2012s Whiterun, maybe it´s also compatible) Whiterun, download the Version for Vanilla Whiterun - If you´re using Chris2012s Whiterun HQ Texture Pack download the Chris2012s Version. All Textures are 1024x1024. 

I also added grassy ground or road Textures, but they are still wip. Have Fun! If you like this Mod, please endorse, so that others can see/use it :)

At the Screenshots it looks like there are only a little tiny differents between the Versions, but thats because of the lightning in Whiterun. Maybe it´s better to try them out ingame to find your favourite one...

Screenshots (except the comparisons) were taken with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7177]SmoowaENB[/url] 

Note for Chris2012s: All Files were modified by myself (without using any of yours), so there´s no need to Credit you in my Mod. 
But anyway, thank you for the nice work in Whiterun :)) You can find [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=114]Chris2012s Whiterun HQ Texture Pack right here![/url]
author: Zappoo
